services.title: Water Supply Line Installation
services.description: Installing new pipelines for kitchens, bathrooms, and laundry areas to ensure proper water flow and pressure.

services.title: Bathroom and Kitchen Fixture Installation
services.description: Setting up sinks, toilets, showers, bathtubs, faucets, and bidets, and connecting them to the water supply and drainage system.

services.title: Pipe Fitting and Replacement
services.description: Measuring, cutting, joining, and installing pipes; replacing old or leaking pipes with durable materials like PVC, PPR, or copper.

services.title: Leak Detection and Repair
services.description: Locating and fixing water leaks in supply lines, drains, or fittings to prevent water damage and wastage.

services.title: Outdoor and Auxiliary Plumbing Works
services.description: Installing garden faucets, irrigation or sprinkler systems, and outdoor kitchen/laundry water connections.

services.title: House Wiring Installation
services.description: Installing new electrical wiring systems in houses, including outlets, switches, lighting, and circuit breakers.

services.title: Outlet and Switch Installation
services.description: Adding or relocating power outlets and switches to improve household convenience and safety.

services.title: Lighting Fixture Installation and Repair
services.description: Setting up ceiling lights, chandeliers, LED fixtures, outdoor lighting, and replacing defective bulbs or wirings.

services.title: Electrical System Troubleshooting and Repair
services.description: Identifying faults such as short circuits, tripped breakers, or faulty switches and repairing them safely.

services.title: Preventive Electrical Maintenance
services.description: Inspecting electrical systems for loose connections, damaged wires, or overloaded circuits to avoid accidents.

title: Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning (RAC) Servicing NC II (Domestic)

services.title: Install domestic refrigeration and air-conditioning units
services.description: For homeowners who need assistance in installing domestic refrigeration and AC units such as Window-type, Package-type (PACU), and Commercial (CACU).

services.title: Service & maintain domestic refrigeration and air-conditioning units
services.description: A service that covers the maintenance of domestic refrigeration and air-conditioning units, including cleaning, maintaining fan motor assembly, servicing evaporator/condenser, and servicing electrical power/control circuits.

services.title: Troubleshoot & repair domestic refrigeration and air-conditioning systems
House Framing and Structural Carpentry
services.description: Building or repairing wooden frameworks for walls, partitions, ceilings, doors, and windows.

services.title: Cabinet and Furniture Making
services.description: Constructing or repairing built-in cabinets, wardrobes, shelves, tables, and other wooden furniture.

services.title: Door and Window Installation/Repair
services.description: Installing wooden doors, jambs, and window frames; repairing misaligned or damaged panels.

services.title: Flooring and Ceiling Works
services.description: Installing wooden or laminated flooring, ceiling panels, and moldings to enhance interior finishes.

services.title: Finishing and Woodworks
services.description: Sanding, varnishing, and refinishing wooden surfaces for furniture, doors, and flooring to improve durability and aesthetics.

services.title: Block/Brick Layering
services.description: Constructing or repairing walls, partitions, fences, and small structures using hollow blocks or bricks.

services.title: Plaster Wall/Surface Finishing
services.description: Applying plaster (mortar/cement) over masonry or concrete walls to have a smooth/semi-smooth surface.

services.title: Repair of Cracked Walls and Surfaces
services.description: Restoring damaged masonry surfaces, filling gaps, and reinforcing weak areas.

services.title: Stone Works for Landscaping
services.description: Installing garden stone pathways, decorative stone walls, or outdoor stone cladding.

services.title: Repair of Defective Concrete
services.description: Installing or repairing concrete floors, driveways, walkways, and outdoor pavements.

services.title: Surface Preparation & Finishing
services.description: Leveling and smoothing surfaces; mixing adhesive/mortar correctly; cleaning surfaces; making sure substrate is appropriate.

services.title: Tiling Corners
services.description: Proper installation at corners: ensuring internal corners (inside corners) and external corners are neat.

services.title: Installing Tiles on Curved Surfaces
services.description: Laying ceramic, porcelain, or natural stone tiles on indoor and outdoor floors with proper leveling and alignment.

services.title: Tile Repair / Maintenance
services.description: Replacing cracked, chipped, or misaligned tiles while ensuring consistent color and pattern.

services.title: Wall Tiling
services.description: Installing wall tiles in kitchens, bathrooms, and other interior/exterior walls for protection and aesthetics.

services.title: Tile Installation on Floors
services.description: Working on curved or irregular surfaces (e.g. rounded pillars, curved walls or niches).

services.title: Grouting
services.description: Applying grout, sealants, and polishing tiles to enhance durability and appearance.

services.title: Surface Sanding
services.description: Preparing walls before painting.

services.title: Retouch/Repaint
services.description: Fixing spots, touching up areas with detected defects, and matching colors.

services.title: Wall Painting
services.description: Properly applying paint to the wall in any color of preference.

services.title: Mixing/Tinting Paints
services.description: Exactly matching color, preparing custom tints, mixing according to preferred color.

services.title: Television Installation and Repair
services.description: Setting up LED/LCD/Smart TVs, wall-mounting, troubleshooting display issues, and repairing power or sound defects.

services.title: Repairing/Troubleshooting Audio, Video Equipment
services.description: Installing, configuring, and repairing speakers, amplifiers, and surround sound systems.

services.title: Repair / Maintenance of Domestic Electronic Appliances
Mobile and Gadget Repair (Basic)
services.description: Performing minor repairs on mobile phones, tablets, and electronic devices such as charging port or battery issues.

services.title: Small Electronics Repair
services.description: Servicing household gadgets like electric fans, rice cookers, blenders, and induction cookers.

services.title: Home Electronics Installation and Setup
services.description: Installing Wi-Fi routers, CCTV systems, set-top boxes, or entertainment systems for household use.

services.title: Computer System Assembly/Setup
services.description: Assembling desktop PCs from parts, installing operating systems, and setting up basic applications for home use.

services.title: PC Troubleshooting
services.description: Diagnosing and fixing hardware issues (e.g., faulty power supply, RAM, hard drives) and basic software errors.

services.title: Network Installation (Wi-Fi, printer sharing)
services.description: Setting up home Wi-Fi routers, LAN connections, and small home networks for internet sharing and device connectivity.

services.title: Repair unit/gadget hardware related problem
services.description: Installing and configuring printers, scanners, webcams, and external storage devices.

services.title: Backup, Recovery, & Data Protection
services.description: Helping homeowners back up important files and recovering data from damaged or formatted drives.

services.title: Virus Removal and System Maintenance
services.description: Installing antivirus software, removing malware, optimizing system performance, and performing regular check-ups.
